question: {name1} eats {n1} {food} per day, {name2} eats {n2} {food} per day, and their {relation} eats a fraction of {frac} of the combined number of {food} they eat per day. After one month, the family decides to go on a diet in the second month, reducing their food consumption by {p1}% for the first half of the month, and then by an additional {p2}% for the second half. How many {food} does this family eat in two months?
